column6:
"SILVER SABLE",2005,12
In her efforts to apprehend Spider-Man, Silver Sable inadvertently convinces authorities-and the media-that Spidey does indeed go to Midtown High School. And the first backpack they're going to check belongs to none other than-Peter Parker! But Peter's already taken the advice of his new girlfriend-Ultimate X-Men's Kitty Pryde-and seeks out Sable and her Wildpack for a showdown. Things do not go as planned for the web-spinner. Not at all. Part 2 (of 5)

32 PGS./T+ SUGGESTED FOR TEENS AND UP ...$2.50
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | inker:Scott Hanna | colorist:J. D. Smith
